thread.section_title: The Marine Hermanus - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wall to wall luxury
thread.title_full: Wall to wall luxury - Review of The Marine Hermanus, Hermanus, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: SandLHighlands
title: Wall to wall luxury
text: We've stayed in some lovely hotels (not reviewed many of them - we're a bit random!) but this one stands out: great attention to detail, staff efficient and helpful, beautifully appointed rooms, traditional decor with good light and comfort that lifts the spirit and provides a great sense of peace. Can't really put my finger on it but it has a magical quality. Excellent buffet breakfast, plus fine choice of individually cooked dishes, served beautifully. So glad we stayed.
